Nieves es divorciada y tiene dos hijos con los cuales vive en una casa alquilada en la zona de Villa Fátima la misma ubicada en la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la primera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la primera junto a KIVA.
texts.en: Nieves works as an employee in a private firm that sells services.  Her husband lives abroad and sends her a bit of money each month to help complete the necessary income to support her and her two children.  She needs the loan to buy school supplies for her children since classes have started.  Nieves is divorced and has two childen she lives with in a rented house located in the city of La Paz's Villa Fátima zone.  This is thei first time she's worked with IMPRO and first with KIVA.

loans.use: to buy school supplies for her two children.

loans.name: Silvia

texts.en: Silvia is 28 years old, married, and has two children. She lives in Hoima, Uganda. She has been farming for six years. With the proceeds she has been able to provide for the basic needs of her children. She faces a challenge of price fluctuations and inadequate capital. Her family goal is to educate her children, and her business goal is to expand her business to new markets and hire employees. Silvia needs the loan to buy rice and soybeans for planting.

loans.use: to buy rice and soybeans for planting.

loans.name: Rudo's Group

texts.en: This is 47-year-old Rudo from Harare, the capital of Zimbabwe. She is married and has five children, one of whom attends school. Rudo runs a retail business selling clothes. The business has been in operation for 10 years. She says the main challenge for her business is a dilapidated market place. Rudo has requested a loan to buy more clothes for resale. With the extra income generated as a result of this loan, she will be able to enhance her family's welfare. In the future Rudo is planning to expand and own a clothing shop in the City Centre.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale

loans.name: Antonio

texts.en:
Antonio is 62 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is widowed and has 3 children. 
Antonio has a shop that sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. He has had this business for 10 years. He requested a loan of 12,000 to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell.
Antonio has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Antonio hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages to sell

loans.name: Peterson Mugo

texts.en:
Peterson is applying for his fourth loan with KADET Ltd. after repaying the previous loans successfully. He will use the loan to hire laborers to work on the farm and buy seedlings for planting.  

With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to buy a lorry for transporting the products to different markets.

loans.use: To hire laborers to work on the farm, and to buy seedlings for planting.

loans.name: Rosa Flor

texts.es:
Rosa Flor tiene 21 años de edad es soltera tiene 1 hijo, vive con los padres y con el hijo de 1 año de edad en Guaranda provincia Bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda.

Rosa se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de lechuga, coliflor, brócoli, zanahoria, cebolla.
 
Solicita el crédito para comprar las semillas, plantas de cebolla, lechuga, fertilizantes, urea. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda cada 15 días.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá  comprar los insumos sin ningún problema. El sueño es poder comprar un vehículo. En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar, ver televisión.
texts.en:
Rosa Flor is 21 years old, single, and has one child.  She lives with her parents and her 1-year-old son in Guaranda, in Bolívar province.

The Mushuc Yuyay community bank is located 30 minutes from our offices.  It has 10 members who are from Quivillungo community, in Guaranda.

Rosa is a farmer who grows lettuce, cauliflower, broccoli, carrots and onions.  She is requesting this loan to buy seeds, onion plants, lettuce, fertilizers and urea.  She makes her purchases and sales in Guaranda every two weeks.  

With the help of this loan, Rosa will be able to buy the supplies she needs without any problems.  Her dream is to buy a vehicle.  In her spare time, she enjoys relaxing and watching the television.

loans.use: to buy seeds, onion plants, lettuce, fertilizers and urea

loans.name: Genevieve

texts.en:
Genevieve  is 31 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is widowed and has 5 children. 
Genevieve  has a shop that sells fruit & non-fruit seedlings, like mahogany & mango trees. She has had this business for 2 years. She requested a loan for 11,000 to buy fertilizers for the fruit & non-fruit seedlings.
Genevieve has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Genevieve hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for the fruit & non-fruit seedlings

loans.name: Annet

texts.en: Annet is a hardworking woman living in Masindi, Uganda. She has been operating a retail shop and this has enabled her to take care of her children. She faces the challenges of price fluctuations and inflation and her dream is to have a wholesale shop. Annet needs the loan to buy soap and sugar for resale.

loans.use: to buy soap and sugar for resale.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is 56 years old, married, and has eight children. He runs a butcher shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for 15 years and has employed six people. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to educate his children and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 70,000 KES to buy two bulls for slaughter.

loans.use: To buy two bulls for slaughter

loans.name: Avelino

texts.es:
Avelino tiene 37 años de edad es casado tiene 5 hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 12, 8, 6, 4 y 1 año de edad en Guaranda Provincia de bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda

Avelino se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de hortalizas, coles, tomate, babacos, lechuga,  zanahoria, además se dedica a la cría de animales como cerdos, pollos, y ganados.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas de calidad, abonos, líquidos para las plagas. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los abonos y fertilizantes.

Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda cada 15 días. El sueño es poder tener un negocio propio, casa ,  vehículo , culminar los estudios y graduarse.

En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar, dedicar tiempo a los hijos y practicar deporte.
texts.en:
Avelino is 37 years old and married with five children. He lives with his wife and children, ages 12,8, 6,4 and 1, in Guaranda, in Bolivar province.

The Mushuc Yuyay Communal Bank is located 30 minutes from the office and is made up of 10 members from Quivillungo community, belonging to the town of Guaranda.

Avelino farms vegetables, cabbage, tomatoes, babacos (mountain papayas), lettuce and carrots and also raises animals such as pigs, chickens and cattle. He is applying for a loan to buy high quality seeds, compost, and pest control liquids. With the help of the loan he will be able to purchase compost and fertilizer.

Avelino buys and sells in Guaranda every 15 days. His dream is to own his own business, house and vehicle and to finish his studies and graduate. In his free time he enjoys resting, spending time with his children and playing sports.

loans.use: to purchase high quality seeds, fertilizer and pest control liquids.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is 29 years old, married, and has three children living in Hioma, Uganda. He is a teacher and has been teaching for seven years. He also has nursery beds of flowers which he sells to hotels and families that need to beautify thier compounds. He faces a challenge of high taxes and his family goal is to educate his children. Peter intends to use the loan to buy seedlings for his nursery beds.

loans.use: to buy seedlings for his nursery beds.

loans.name: Maria Aida

texts.es:
María Aída tiene 31 años de edad es casada tiene 31 años de edad  tiene 1 hijo, vive con el esposo y con el hijo de 6 años de edad en Guaranda provincia de bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda.

María se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de brócoli, lechuga y mora además cría pollos y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar los insumos, fertilizantes, urea, abonos, balanceado, vitaminas, vacunas, desparacitantes.

Las compras y las ventas los hace en Guaranda cada 15 días.Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y el mal clima.

 El sueño es poder comprar un vehículo para transportar los productos, en el tiempo libre le gusta jugar cartas.
texts.en:
María Aída is 31 years old, married, and has one child.  She lives with her husband and her 6-year-old son in Guaranda, in Bolívar province.

The Mushuc Yuyay community bank is located 30 minutes from our offices.  It has 10 members who are from Quivillungo community, in Guaranda.

María is a farmer who grows broccoli, lettuce and blackberries.  She also raises chickens and pigs.  She is requesting this loan to buy supplies, fertilizers, urea, manure, nutritionally-balanced animal feed, vitamins, vaccines and parasite remedies.  She makes her purchases and sales in Guaranda every two weeks.  The challenges she faces are pests and bad weather.

María's dream is to buy a vehicle for transporting her produce.  In her spare time, she enjoys playing cards.

loans.use: to buy supplies, fertilizers, urea, manure, nutritionally-balanced animal feed, vitamins, vaccines and parasite remedies

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard is hardworking married father of six children, living in Hioma, Uganda.  He has a bar and lodge business which he has been running for 1 year.  He has high hopes that his business will grow.  He started as a farmer and he saved to start the current business.  He faces a challenge of price fluctuations, and his family goal is to educate his children and expand his business to new markets  Richard needs the loan facility to renovate his residential house.

loans.use: to renovate his residential house.

loans.name: Andrew

texts.en: Andrew is 25 years old and runs a grocery store to earn a living. He has been in the business for three years and has employed one person. He also does dairy farming to earn extra income. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his business and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 20,000 KES to buy potatoes, carrots, onions, and maize to sell.

loans.use: To buy potatoes, carrots, onions, and maize

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es:
Sergio tiene 30 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 10 y 7 años de edad en  Guaranda Provincia de bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda.

Sergio se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de mora, lechugas cebolla, zanahoria además cría pollos y cerdos. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda.

Solicita el crédito para poder comprar semillas, plantas de cebollas, brócoli, abonos, líquidos, fertilizantes. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar la magnitud de la siembra.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y el mal clima. El sueño es poder comprar un vehículo y una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar.
texts.en:
Sergio, 30, is married and has two children; he lives with his wife and children who are 10 and 7 years old in Guaranda, Bolívar Province.

The “Mushuc Yuyay” communal bank is located thirty minutes from the office and it has ten members in the community of Quivillungo belonging to Guaranda.

Sergio is a farmer.  He grows blackberries, lettuce, onions and lettuce.  He also raises chicks and pigs.  His purchases and his sales take place in Guaranda.

He is requesting the loan to be able to buy seeds, onion plants, broccoli, manure, liquids and fertilizers.  With help from the loan he will be able to expand the size of his plantings.

He faces challenges like infestations and poor weather.  His dream is to be able to buy a vehicle and a house.  In his free time he likes to rest.

loans.use: to buy seeds, onion plants, broccoli, manure, liquids and fertilizer.

loans.name: Rosa Del Carmen

texts.es: Rosa del Carmen de treinta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una venta de ropa y peluches en el lugar de su residencia, vende en variedad vestidos, blusas, pantalones se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles, además el servicio es único; Rosa es una mujer encantadora siempre esta con una sonrisa en el rostro y dispuesta a trabajar duro para superarse a sí misma, piensa que solo obtiene el existo quien en verdad lo desea, ella está segura de lo que quiere es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor y peluches. Rosa del Carmen tiene la confianza que así podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica  una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en: Rosa del Carmen is 34 years old and lives together with her life partner and children in her own home.  She has a business selling clothing and stuffed toys from her home.  She sells a range of dresses, blouses and pants (trousers).  She has a lot of customers because everything she sells is very good quality and she sells her products at affordable prices.  In addition, her service is second-to-none.  Rosa is a lovely woman who always has a smile on her face and is ready to work hard in order to do well.  She believes that only those who truly wish for success will obtain it.  She is certain of what she wants and she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL in order to buy clothing wholesale, and also stuffed toys.  Rosa del Carmen believes that this will enable her to provide her household with financial security and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothing wholesale, and also stuffed toys

loans.name: Maria Aurora

texts.es:
María Aurora tiene 62 años de edad es viuda tiene una hija, vive con la nieta en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda.

María se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de hortalizas como lechugas, cebolla, brócoli, zanahoria.  

Solicita el crédito para poder  comprar semillas, plantas de cebolla, lechugas, y  fertilizantes, abono orgánico. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda cada 15 días.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar la producción. El sueño es poder comprar un vehículo y una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar y disfrutar de las fiestas
texts.en:
María Aurora, 62, is widowed and has a daughter; she lives with her granddaughter in Guaranda, Bolívar Province.

The “Mushuc Yuyay” communal bank is located thirty minutes from the office and it has ten members in the community of Quivillungo belonging to Guaranda.

María is a farmer; she grows vegetables like lettuce, onions, broccoli and carrots.  

She asks for the loan to be able to buy seeds, onion plants, lettuce, fertilizers and organic manure.  Her purchases and sales take place in Guaranda every fifteen days.

With help from the loan she will be able to increase production. Her dream is to be able to buy a vehicle and a house.  In her free time she likes to rest and enjoy the festivals.

loans.use: to buy seeds, onion plants, lettuce, fertilizer and organic manure.

loans.name: María Monserrate

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Banco Comunal Madres Unidas.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora María, ella tiene 52 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene 5 hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad, 4 de  sus hijos aun viven con ella, dos de ellos son casados y viven con sus familias. Su esposo es comerciante.

Ella es una muy buena esposa y ama de casa  que realiza el crédito para ayudar en el negocio de su esposo, el cual es la fuente ingresos para toda la familia, su esposo se dedica al comercio vende frutas, legumbres y granos, su forma de venta es ambulante él recorre un  mercado en Manta, allí  vende sus productos a las personas que asisten todos los días hasta este lugar para realizar sus compras, trabaja 4 días a la semana y esto lo viene realizando desde hace mas 36 años y gracias a Dios le ha ido muy bien.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar legumbres, frutas, frejol y otros granos que vende. Es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que ha recibido de la institución. 

Su sueño es tener una tienda.
texts.en:
The members of the Communal Bank "Madres Unidas" (United Mothers) meet every 15 days in the lowlands of Montecristi, a city that is known for its great diversity of traditional products. For example, the Panama hats that are produced here are known within and outside of the country.

It is in this place that one can meet Sra. María. She is 52 years old, married, and has five children who are already grown. Four of them still live with her. Two of them are married and live with their families. Her husband is a merchant.

María is a wonderful wife and homemaker who is receiving this loan to help with her husband's business, which provides income for their entire family. Her husband is a merchant who sells fruits, legumes, and grains as a street vendor. He travels to a market in Manta where he sells his products. Her husband attends to his customers every day in this place where they make their purchases. He works four days a week and has been in this business for more than 36 years. Thanks to God, he has done very well.

This loan will be used to buy legumes, fruits, beans, and other grains to sell. María is a founding member of her Communal Bank and enjoys the assistance she has received from Fundación ESPOIR. Her dream is to open a store.

loans.use: to buy legumes, fruits, beans, and grains.

loans.name: Maria Rosa

texts.es:
María Rosa tiene 41 años de edad es casada tiene 4 hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda.

María se dedica a la siembra de hortalizas como la lechuga, cebolla, brócoli. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda cada 15 días.

Solicita el crédito para poder comprar los insumos, fertilizantes, líquidos para la maleza, semillas, plantas de lechuga y cebolla.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá poner en marcha la siembra.  El sueño es tener un negocio propio. En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar.
texts.en:
María Rosa, 41, is married and has four children; she lives with her husband and children in Guaranda, Bolívar Province.

The “Mushuc Yuyay” communal bank is located thirty minutes from the office and it has ten members in the community of Quivillungo belonging to Guaranda.

María grows vegetables like lettuce, onions and broccoli.  Her purchases and sales take place in Guaranda every fifteen days.

She asks for the loan to be able to buy supplies, fertilizer, weed killers, seeds, lettuce and onion plants.  With help from the loan she will be able to start planting.  Her dream is to have a business of her own.  In her free time she likes to rest.

loans.use: to buy supplies, fertilizer, weed killers, seeds, onion and lettuce plants.

loans.name: María Esther

texts.es: María Esther de treinta y dos años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia. Ella posee un taller de costura en el lugar donde reside, es muy conocida en el lugar pues confecciona las mejores prendas de vestir al gusto del cliente, como pantalones, vestidos,  faldas entre otros, toda la materia prima que utiliza es de muy buena calidad y vende a precios accesibles; María es una mujer muy trabajadora sabe aprovechar las oportunidades que se le presentan, piensa que la motivación nos impulsa a comenzar y el hábito nos permite continuar, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela por mayor, hilos etc. María Esther tiene la esperanza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: María Esther is 32 years old and lives with her life partner and children in her own home.  She has a sewing workshop in her home and is very well known in her area because she makes the best clothing, such as trousers, dresses and skirts, to her customers' tastes.  All of the raw materials she uses are very good quality and she sells her products at affordable prices.  María is a very hard-working woman who knows how to make the most of opportunities that present themselves.  She thinks that motivation drives us to start working and habit allows us to continue.  She is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy fabric, thread, etc. wholesale.  She hopes that this will enable her to provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fabric wholesale

loans.name: Maria Manuela

texts.es:
María Manuela  tiene 23 años de edad es casada tiene un hijo, vive con el esposo y con el hijo de 1 año de edad en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda.

María se dedica a la siembra de  lechuga, brócoli, cebolla, además cría animales como pollos y ganado.

Solicita el crédito para poder comprar semillas, fertilizantes, urea, líquidos para la maleza, plantas de cebolla, brócoli.

Las compras y las ventas lo hace en  Guaranda cada 15 días. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar la producción.

El sueño es contar con un vehículo para la familia. En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar y también bailar.
texts.en:
María Manuela, 23, is married and has a son; she lives with her husband and son in Guaranda, Bolívar Province.

The “Mushuc Yuyay” communal bank is located thirty minutes from the office and it has ten members in the community of Quivillungo belonging to Guaranda.

María grows lettuce, broccoli, onions and also raises animals like chicks and cattle.

She asks for the loan to be able to buy seeds, fertilizer, urea, weed killers, onion plants and broccoli.

Her purchases and sales take place in Guaranda every fifteen days.  With help from the loan she will be able to increase production.  Her dream is to have a vehicle for her family.   In her free time she likes to rest and also to dance.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, urea, weed killers, onion plants and broccoli.

loans.name: Yamile Del Socorro

texts.es: Yamile es una mujer muy creativa, ella se dedica a la elaboración de tapetes, utilizando como materias primas los retazos de tela que venden en el mercado a mejores precios; con ello fabrica hermosos detalles, abullonadas colchas que se utilizan como limpiones industriales y son expendidos en el barrio a compradores y distribuidores, detallistas. Ella con su negocio ha apoyado la gestión de bienestar en su hogar, conformado por su cónyuge y una hija de 22 años de edad. Su meta mas adelante es ampliar su negocio, adquiriendo maquinarias que le permitan una mayor tecnificación y con ello ampliaría su mercado e incrementaría sus ingresos y posibilidades de progresar. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará una máquina de coser y retazos en mayor volumen. Su mayor desafío es la competencia y por esto se prepara en la búsqueda de mejores precios comprando en un mayor volumen, como justamente lo hará con su credikiva.
texts.en:
Yamile is a very creative woman.  She makes large sized cleaning rags.  The raw materials that she uses are the fabric scraps that are sold at the market for the best prices.  With the scraps she adds beautiful details and makes them somewhat quilted and puffy.  They are used for industrial cleaning jobs, and they are sold in the neighborhood to buyers, distributors, and retailers.

With her business she has supported the well-being of her household, which is comprised of her husband and her 22 year old daughter.  Her goal for the future is to expand her business and to get machines that will allow her greater modernization.  With this she will widen her market, increase her income, and increase her possibilities to progress.

She is currently requesting a Kiva loan, which is her first with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  She will use the loan to buy a sewing machine and a greater volume of fabric scraps.  Her biggest challenge is the competition.  Therefore she prepares by seeking the best prices in a greater volume.  That is exactly what she will do with her Kiva loan.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and fabric scraps.

loans.name: Pedro Fernando

texts.es:
Pedro Fernando tiene 22 años de edad es casado tiene una hija, vive con la esposa y con la hija de 2 años de edad en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda.

Pedro se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de mora, cebolla, y crianza de pollos y ganado.
Solicita El Crédito Para poder comprar los abonos, fertilizantes, semillas, urea. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda cada semana.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son el mal tiempo y la competencia. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los insumos e incrementar la producción. 

El sueño es poder un vehículo para trasportar los productos. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar indor.
texts.en:
Pedro Fernando, 22, is married and has a daughter; he lives with his wife and two year old daughter in Guaranda, Bolívar Province.

The “Mushuc Yuyay” communal bank is located thirty minutes from the office and it has ten members in the community of Quivillungo belonging to Guaranda.

Pedro farms blackberries and onions and raises chicks and cattle.

He asks for the loan to be able to buy manure, fertilizer, seeds and urea.  His purchases and sales take place in Guaranda every week.  The challenges he faces are poor weather and competition.  With help from the loan he will be able to buy supplies and increase production.

His dream is to be able to buy a vehicle to transport his products.  In his free time he likes playing Indor soccer.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer, seeds and urea.

loans.name: Laura Janeth

texts.es:
Laura Janeth tiene 19 años de edad es madre soltera tiene 1 hijo, vive con los padres y el hijo de 1 año de edad en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda.

Laura se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de mora además cría pollos y ganado. Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, fertilizantes, líquidos, urea, insecticidas y balanceado.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar la producción y por ende los ingresos para la familia. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda cada quince días.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y mal tiempo. El sueño es poder comprarse  una hacienda. En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar.
texts.en:
Laura Janeth, 19, is a single mother and has one son; she lives with her parents and one year old son in Guaranda, Bolívar Province.

The “Mushuc Yuyay” communal bank is located thirty minutes from the office and it has ten members in the community of Quivillungo belonging to Guaranda.

Laura farms blackberries and also raises chicks and cattle.  She asks for the loan to buy supplies, fertilizer, liquids, urea, insecticide and nutritionally balanced animal feed.

With help from the loan she will be able to increase production and thus family income.  Her purchases and sales take place in Guaranda every fifteen days.

The challenges she faces are infestations and poor weather.  Her dream is to be able to buy a hacienda for herself.  In her free time she likes to rest.

loans.use: to buy supplies, fertilizer, liquids, urea, insecticides and nutritionally balanced feed.

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es: María del Carmen de cincuenta y uno años de edad vive con su compañero de vida; ella posee una tortillería y una pequeña tienda donde vende frijoles, pan golosinas entre otros, está situada en el lugar de su residencia, últimamente se ha hecho de más clientela, ya que es toda una negociante y ofrece lo que la gente busca, todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y lo vende a precios bajos además el servicio es muy eficiente; María es una mujer emprendedora dispuesta a obtener éxitos en su vida, piensa que sus más grandes secretos son la constancia y la responsabilidad, tiene esas cualidades es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, granos básicos, golosinas, bebidas, pan etc. María del Carmen tiene fe que así podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: María del Carmen is 51 years old and lives with her life partner.  She has a tortilla bakery and a small store where she sells beans, bread, candies and other products.  Her business is located in her home.  She has attracted a lot more customers recently as she is a good businesswoman and offers what people are looking for.  Everything she sells is very good quality and she sells all her products at low prices.  In addition, her service is very efficient.  María is an entrepreneurial woman who is ready to succeed in life.  She believes that her biggest secrets are her perseverance and responsibility.  She decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL so that she could buy corn wholesale.  She will also buy basic grains, candies, drinks, bread, etc. María del Carmen believes that this will enable her to provide her family with a good life.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale, as well as basic grains, candies, drinks and bread

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica, aged forty-two is married to James. They are blessed with four children aged between eleven and nineteen. She has rental houses which give her a monthly income of KES 80,000.

This is her fourth loan from KADET Ltd. She has a good credit history. She will use the funds to buy cement, ballast and also pay wages. Veronica hopes to build a three stories building in future.

loans.use: To buy building materials.

loans.name: Jaime Arcidas

texts.es:
Jaime Arcidas tiene 27 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos vive con los padres en guaranda provincia de Bolívar.

Es integrante de la Vrc Nuevos Horizontes, la comunidad se encuentra a unos 40 minutos en la comunidad santa Martha perteneciente al Cantón Guaranda.

Jaime se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de naranjilla y mora, además se dedica a la venta de animales como chanchos, borregos, pollos y ganado.

Solicita el crédito para poder dar mantenimiento a los cultivos de naranjilla y mora, compra de isemillas, nsumos, abonos, fertlizantes, urea, lìquidos para la maleza.Con el dinero podrá comprar los insumos que son de utilidad para toda siembra. Las compras las ventas lo hace en Guaranda o en Echeandía cada 15 días.

 Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y el mal tiempo muchas lluvias y se pudre los cultivos.
El sueño es poder comprarse un vehículo y una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta pasear, practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Jaime Arcidas is 27 years old and single. He does not have children and he lives with his parents in Guaranda, in Bolivar province.

He is a member of the Vrc Nuevos Horizontes. The community is found about 40 minutes from the community of Santa Martha, belonging to the canton of Guaranda.


Jaime works in agriculture, sowing naranjilla and blackberries. Also he works selling animals such as pigs, lambs, chickens, and livestock.

He requests the loan for the upkeep of his naranjilla and blackberry crops, to buy seeds, supplies, fertilizers, urea, and liquid weedkiller. With the money he'll buy the supplies useful for all kinds of sowing. He does his buying and selling in Guaranda or in Echeandía every 15 days.

The challenges facing him are plagues and bad weather. A lot of rain and the crops rot. His dream is to be able to buy himself a vehicle and a house. In his free time he likes to take walks and practice sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds, supplies, fertilizers, urea, and liquid weed killer.

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is 48 years old, single, and has three children. She runs a retail shop, which she has been doing for  three years.  The business generates a monthly income of 6,000 KES. 

Cecilia is requesting her second loan from KADET LTD, which she will use to buy salt, tea leaves, and sugar.  She will use the profits to build rental houses on her plot of land.

loans.use: to purchase salt, tea leaves, and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Abesigangaine Kigorobya Group

texts.en:
Jackson is a hardworking man aged fifty-four, living in Hioma, Uganda. He is married, with eleven children and he is the group leader for Abesigangaine Kigorobya Group. 

Jackson sells clothes, a business he has been running for over twenty years. He faces a challenge of high transport costs and high taxes. He hopes to expand his business to new markets and educate his children.

Jackson needs the loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy new clothes to sell.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is twenty-four years old. He is from Nakuru, is married to Martha, and they have two children who are in school. 

Peter has been making beds out of steel for sale. He has applied for a loan from KADET Ltd. to enable him buy steel to make more beds and meet his customers' demand.

He hopes to see his business grow and to diversify into a cereal business in the future.

loans.use: To buy more steel for his bed-making business.

loans.name: Daouda Khamat

texts.fr: Daouda est un technicien , maintenancier de matériel audiovisuel. Il répare ainsi des radios, des poste téléviseurs et des téléphone portables. Pour améliorer ses revenus, il fait en même temps de l'embouche bovine.Il est marié et père de  6 enfants dont une fille qui va à l'école.Il sollicite de l'UIMCEC,un pret de 200000f pour acheter un bœuf.Son ambition est d'élargir son activité.
texts.en: Daouda is a technician taking care of audiovisual equipment. He also repairs radios, TV sets and cellular phones. In order to increase his income, he also raises cattle. He is married and the father of six, of one whom, a girl, is in school. He is seeking a loan of 200,000 francs in order to buy a cow. His goal is to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Abel

texts.es: Abel de cincuenta años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; El posee un negocio donde vende bolsas plásticas,y además compra estas mismas usadas para reciclaje y que después el vende a empresas que reutilizan las mismas y convierten en nuevos productos plásticos. Es muy conocido en la zona pues tiene un producto de excelente calidad y lo vende a excelentes precios además el servicio es inigualable; Abel es un hombre honesto que siempre trata de aprovechar las oportunidades que se le presentan, piensa que nunca hay que desistir de un sueño, simplemente trabajar con las señales que nos llevan a él, Abel ya comenzó ese camino de labor por eso se decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar bolsas y materiales de reciclaje plástico por mayor, etc. Abel tiene la esperanza que de esta forma podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Abel, 50, lives with his life companion and their children in his own home. He has a business where he sells plastic bags and also buys recycled used ones which he later sells to businesses that re-use them and convert them into new plastic products.

Abel is well known in the area since he has a product of excellent quality and sells it at excellent prices and in addition his service is unparalleled. He is an honest man who always tries to seize the opportunities that come his way. He believes you should never give up on a dream, simply work with what you have. Abel has already started along that path and therefore decided to apply to INTEGRAL for a loan that will enable him to purchase recycled plastic materials and bags wholesale, etc. He hopes that in this way he will be able to provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy plastic wholesale.

loans.name: Manuel De Jesús

texts.es: Manuel de Jesús de cuarenta años de edad vive con su compañera de vida y su hijo. El posee un negocio de transporte de personas en diferentes zonas del país se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues su trabajo es muy confiable y ofrece precios accesibles; Manuel es un hombre muy dedicado a su trabajo le gusta aprovechar las oportunidades que se le presentan, piensa que el que persevera con sus metas las alcanza y con la gran recompensa del éxito, quiere ver crecer su negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar repuestos que necesita para su vehículo entre otros. Manuel de Jesús tiene la confianza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Manuel de Jesús is 40 years old, he lives with his life partner and son. He has a transportation business for people in different regions of the country. He has gotten a lot of customers because his work is reliable and he has affordable prices. Manuel is a man who is very dedicated to his job and he likes to take advantage of opportunities that present themselves. He thinks that he who perseveres in his goals will reach them and be compensated with great success. He wants to see his business grow and this is why he asks for a loan from INTEGRAL, which will allow him to buy spare parts that he needs for his vehicle among others. Manuel de Jesús is confidant that in this way he'll be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy spare parts for vehicles.

loans.name: Akbarjon

texts.ru: Акбарчон женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Он очень добрый и порядочный человек. Более 2-х лет он занимается купле продажей продуктов питания. Акбарчон имеет широкий ассортимент продуктов и имеет много постоянных клиентов. Жена помогает по бизнесу. Акбарчон запрашивает займ для покупки продуктов питания с целью увлечения ассортимента продуктов. Акбарчон надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Akbarjon is married and bringing up three children. He is very kind and decent person. He has been buying and reselling groceries for over two years. Akbarjon  offers  a wide assortment of products and has many loyal customer. His wife helps him in the business. Akbarjon is requesting a loan in order to stock up on groceries and expand his assortment. He is hoping for your kind help.

loans.use: to buy food products.

loans.name: Tchowou-Abalo

texts.fr:
Abalo est un homme âgé de 38 ans. Il est célibataire.
Abalo travaille comme revendeur depuis 2010. Il tient une cafeteria  pour tous clients. Il achète les produits au grand marché de Lomé. Il travaille seul. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est la rupture de stock.
Abalo a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter les consommables utilisés dans la cafeteria. Il veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Abalo voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Il dit qu’avec les profits, il prévoit d’améliorer ses conditions de vie.
texts.en:
Abalo is a 38 year old man. He is single.
Abalo has worked as a retailer since 2010. He has a cafeteria for all customers. He buys the products in the Grand Marché in Lome. He works alone. At the moment, his biggest difficulty is being out of stock. 
Abalo asked for his first loan from WAGES in order to buy consumables used in the cafeteria. He wants to reinvest in his business.
In the coming years, Abalo would like to increase the size of his business. He says that with the profits, he foresees improving his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy consumables for his cafeteria (sugar, milk, Milo-a chocolate drink)

loans.name: Bilal

texts.en:
Bilal is a thirty-five-year-old married man who has owned a restaurant since 2010.

Bilal is a hardworking man. He opened his small restaurant in 2010. It's almost a snack-bar because he deals with fast food, but he is intending to expand it in the near future. However before making a major step forward, first he must gain the trust and loyalty of his customers.

Bilal is working on improving the delivery sector in many ways, but he needs suitable and attractive brochures and a menu to take this step forward. This is why he has applied for his first loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, to do what's required to improve his business. Most of his customers are friends, relatives, neighbors and passers-by, but Bilal is planning for a wider variety of customers.

He hopes to expand his business more and more and to open a big restaurant is the future.

loans.use: To print brochures and a menu for his restaurant.

loans.name: Phyllis

texts.en:
Phyllis is thirty-eight years old, married, with four children. She sells vegetables, bananas and mangoes to earn a living. She has been in the business for four years and describes her business environment as busy because she has many regular customers. 

Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income and hopes to expand her business to a wholesale in the future. She has applied for a loan of 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy vegetables, bananas and mangoes to sell.

loans.use: To buy vegetables, bananas and mangoes to sell.

loans.name: Amorsolo

texts.en:
Amorsolo is 49 years old, married, and has four children. She works very hard to provide for them.  Amorsolo runs a general store in the Philippines, which she has been doing for eight years.  She sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, and other groceries. 

Amorsolo is requesting a loan from NWTF for PHP 10,000, which she will use to purchase more stock to sell.  In the future, Amorsolo would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Abla

texts.fr:
Abla est une femme âgée de 32 ans. Elle est célibataire et a 1 enfant. 
Abla travaille comme revendeuse depuis 2008. Elle vend de l’huile de noix palme pour tous  clients à domicile. Elle achète les produits à Tsévié. Elle travaille seule. Au moment, sa difficulté principale est de ne pouvoir pas satisfaire toutes les demandes.
Abla a requis son second crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter de l’huile de noix de palme. Elle veut réinvestir dans l’activité.
Dans les prochaines années, Abla voudrait agrandir la taille de son activité. Elle dit qu’avec les profits, elle prévoit d’assurer la scolarité de son enfant.
texts.en:
Abla is a 32 year old woman. She is single and has one child.
Abla has worked as a reseller since 2008. She sells palm oil to all her customers at home. She buys the products in Tsévié. She works alone. At the moment, her main difficulty is that she can't satisfy all the demand.
Abla asked for her second loan from WAGES in order to buy palm oil. She wants to reinvest in her business.
In the coming years, Abla would like to increase the size of her business. She says that with the profit, she foresees being able to provide for her child's education.

loans.use: to buy palm oil.

loans.name: Ada Patricia

texts.es: Ada Patricia de treinta y seis años de edad vive junto a sus hijos en casa propia; Ella posee venta de ropa ambulante para damas, caballeros y niños y tiene en gran variedad faldas, vestidos, camisas, pantalones, entre otros, es muy conocida en la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues vende producto de muy buena calidad a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; Ada es una mujer muy activa con muchas ganas de salir adelante, piensa que mientras más le cueste llegar al final de sus metas, más grande será su recompensa, es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. Ada Patricia tiene fe que así podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica y una mejor vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Ada Patricia is 36 years old, and lives with her children in her own house. She works in street markets selling clothing for women, men and children, and offers a wide variety of skirts, dresses, shirts, pants and other items. She is well known in the area and has substantially grown her clientele, as she offers high quality products at affordable prices, and her service is excellent. 

Ada is a very active woman with lots of motivation to get ahead. She believes that, the more challenging her goals are to accomplish, the greater her reward will be in the end. She is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL that will allow her to purchase clothing in bulk for her business. Ada Patricia has faith that, with this loan, she will be able to bring economic security to her home and a better life to her family.

loans.use: to purchase clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Doña Margarita Cozajay tiene 50 años de edad, es madre soltera tiene 2 hijos ya mayores de edad tiene su propia casa, nació en la capital de Guatemala y actualmente vive en la capital de Guatemala, Doña Margarita  nos cuenta que desde muy joven empezó a trabajar pero  una de sus metas era tener su propio negocio el primer negocio que tubo fue de venta de frutas pero no le iba muy bien entonces decidió poner un negocio de venta de ropa, entonces desde hace 5 años tiene su venta de ropa  pero ella desea surtir mas su negocio para poder crecer como empresaria, agradece el apoyo que kiva y fape le están brindando y espera poder lograr su sueño.
texts.en:
Margarita is 50 years old, a single mother with two grown children, and lives in her own house. She was born in the capital city of Guatemala, and is currently living there. Margarita tells us that she began working at a young age, and one of her goals was to have her own business. 

The first business she had was selling fruit, and when that did not go well, she decided to open a business selling clothing. She has been selling clothing for 5 years, but she wants to stock more items in her business so that she can expand and grow as a businesswoman. She is grateful for the support Kiva and FAPE are giving her, and she hopes to fulfill her dream.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for resale.

loans.name: Jefferson Wilfrido

texts.es:
Jefferson Wilfrido tiene 18 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en Guaranda provincia de bolívar.

La VRC Mushuc Yuyay  está ubicada a 30 minutos de la oficina conformada por 10 socios en la comunidad Quivillungo Perteneciente a Guaranda.

Jefferson se dedica  a la agricultura a la siembra de lechuga,  brócoli además cría pollos y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, fertilizantes, urea, abono orgánico, vitaminas, vacunas para los animales. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar la producción.  Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es el mal clima y las plagas. El sueño es poder comprarse un vehículo para trabajar en la producción. En el tiempo libre le gustaría estudiar.
texts.en:
Jefferson Wilfrido is 18 years old, single without children, and lives with his parents in Guaranda, in the province of Bolivar. The Village Resource Center (VRC) Mushuc Yuyay is located 30 minutes from the office made up of 10 partners in the Quivillungo community in Guaranda.

Jefferson makes his living in agriculture, in the planting of lettuce and broccoli, and he also raises chickens and pigs. He is requesting this loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, urea, organic manure, vitamins and vaccines for his animals.

With the help of this loan, he will be able to increase his production. He buys and sells products in Guaranda. The challenges he faces are bad climate and plagues. His dream is to be able to buy a vehicle to help in production. In his free time he likes to study.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, urea, organic manure, vitamins and vaccines for animals.

loans.name: Doniyor

texts.ru: Дониёр трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 2-х лет Дониёр занимается перевозкой пассажиров по городскому маршруту. Имеет много постоянных клиентов и от данного бизнеса получает хорошую прибыль. Дониёр запрашивает займ в размере 5000 Сомони чтобы купить автомашину и отремонтировать его.
texts.en: Doniyor is a hardworking and conscientious person.  He is married and raising four children.  His wife is involved in household work.  Doniyor has been involved in transporting passengers along a city route for over two years.  He has many regular customers and earns a good profit from this business.  Doniyor is requesting a loan in the amount of 5000 Somoni to buy and repair a car.

loans.use: to buy and repair a car

loans.name: Bibizainab

texts.ru: Бибизайнаб трудолюбивая и честная девушка. Она очень активная и около одного года занимается купле- продажей детской одежды и женского  белья. Раньше её мать занималась этим бизнесом и вот теперь самостоятельно сама ведёт бизнес. С малых лет она помогает матери в бизнесе. Бибизайнаб запрашивает займ для покупки сезонной детской одежды и женского  белья. Она очень надеется на вашу помощь поддержку.
texts.en: Bibizainab is a hardworking and honest young woman.  She is very active and has been involved in buying and selling children's clothing and women's undergarments for about one year.  Previously, her mother was involved in this business, and now Bibizainab runs this business independently.  Since childhood, she has been helping her mother with the business.  Bibizainab is requesting this loan to buy seasonal children's clothing and women's undergarments.  She is hopes very much to get your help and support.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothing

loans.name: Ramathan

texts.en: Ramathan, a 42-year-old single father of four children living in Hioma, Uganda, has operated a retail shop for over 20 years. Facing the challenges of price fluctuations and educating his children, Ramathan wishes to expand his business to new markets and is therefore requesting a loan to buy sugar, salt and juice to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, salt and juice for resale.

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
Roselyn is 39 years old, married, and has three children.

Roselyn works hard to provide for her family. She runs a variety store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase a large quantity of products for her store.

Roselyn has borrowed and paid six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the variety store for seven years and also earns an income from pig fattening.

Roselyn aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase a large quantity of products for her store.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is 39 years old. He does dairy farming to earn a living. He has been in the business for ten years and describes his business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standards and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 50,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a dairy cow.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Eclay

texts.en:
Eclay is 48 years old, married to Benard, and blessed with two children, aged 26 and 11 years respectively. She is a horticultural farmer, a practice she ventured into ten years ago. She earns a monthly income of KES 5,500.

She has requested a loan of KES 30,000 to purchase fertilizer and seeds in preparation for the planting season. The profit she gets will help her expand her farming. She hopes to be a successful farmer. This is her third loan.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer in preparation for the planting season.

loans.name: Zamira

texts.ru: Замире 53 года, воспитывает сына. В поисках источника дохода для своей небольшой семьи, Замира занимается животноводством и полеводством.  Начав этот бизнес с суммы в 5,000 сом (KGS), Замира развивает хозяйство с 2 коровами, а также занимается обработкой 3 га земли с ячменем, люцерной и кукурузой. Продажа молока и молочных продуктов приносит Замире около 15,000 сом в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Замира обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы Замира планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en: Zamira is 53 years old and raising a son.  She is involved in animal husbandry and farming to provide a source of income for her small family.  Zamira is developing a business, consisting of two cows, and is also involved in growing barley, alfalfa and corn on 3 hectares of land.  Sales of milk and milk products yield about 15,000 som per month for Zamira.  In order to further develop this business, she requested a loan in the amount of 60,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy livestock.  Zamira plans to invest the earnings into a further increase of livestock headcount.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Bibiniso

texts.ru: Бибинисо трудолюбивая и добросовестная женщина, ей 38 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет одного ребенка. Более 6 лет она занимается выращиванием и продажей сельхозпродуктов. Бибинисо хотела бы получить займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки семян и минеральных удобрений. Она надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Bibiniso is a hardworking and conscientious woman.  She is 38 years old, married and has one child.  She has been involved in growing and selling agricultural crops for over six years.  Bibiniso wants to obtain a loan in the amount of 5000 Somoni to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers.  She relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Enid

texts.en:
Enid is 28 years old and a single mother of two children. She lives in Hoima, Uganda. 

She is a farmer and specializes in growing rice and maize, which are very profitable. She has been farming for four years and she faces a challenge of price fluctuation. Her family goal is to work hard and educate her children. She dreams of buying her own land for growing crops, since she is currently  farming on her parents’ land.

Enid needs the loan to buy rice and maize for planting.

loans.use: to buy rice and maize for planting.

loans.name: Akram

texts.ru: Акрам добрый и целеустремленный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Более 18 лет он занимается купле- продажей сухофруктов на рынке. Он покупает абрикос, перерабатывает его, а затем продает за хорошую цену. Имеет большой опыт работы. Жена помогает по бизнесу. Акрам хотел бы получить займ для покупки сухофруктов с целью увлечения оборотного капитала.
texts.en: Akram is a kind and goal-oriented person.  He is married and has four children.  He has been involved in buying and selling dried fruits at a market for over 18 years.  Akram buys apricots, processes it and then sells it at a good price.  He has a lot of work experience.  His wife helps him with the business.  Akram wants to obtain this loan to buy dried fruits in order to increase his revolving capital.

loans.use: to buy dried fruits

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es: Sandra Elizabeth de cuarenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su familia; ella posee un taller de costura en el lugar de su residencia, confecciona variedad de prendas como vestidos, pantalones, camisas entre otros, se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente, pues su trabajo es de muy buena calidad y tiene precios accesibles, además el servicio es excelente; Sandra es una mujer muy trabajadora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, piensa que el éxito es la utilización máxima de la habilidad que se tiene, y quiere aprovechar su habilidad, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela por mayor, hilos, agujas etc. Sandra Elizabeth tiene la esperanza que de esta forma podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Sandra Elizabeth is 44 years old, and lives with her family. She has a sewing workshop in her home where she makes a variety of garments, such as dresses, pants, shirts and other items. Lately, she has acquired many customers, since she does high quality work, her prices are very reasonable, and her service is excellent.

Sandra is a very hardworking woman with a strong desire to get ahead. She believes that success comes from fully utilizing the abilities she has, and she desires to take advantage of those abilities. 

In keeping with her goals, she has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL, which will allow her to purchase fabric in bulk, as well as needles and thread, etc. Sandra Elizabeth hopes that this will enable her to improve the quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to purchase fabric in bulk, needles and thread.

loans.name: Kebon Bawang 2 Group

texts.en: Nurhayati has been receiving sewing orders for several years. She used her previous loan to pay for completing sewing supplies for her orders. This business is going well and she wants to add to her business. Now she is taking a 2,500,000 Indonesian Rupiah loan from VisionFund Indonesia to open a barber shop. She hopes from her sewing orders and barber shop she can have savings to continuously send her children to school. In the future, she wants to make the barber shop well-known in her environment so she can bring in a lot of customers.

loans.use: to pay for opening a barber shop

loans.name: Analie

texts.en:
Analie is married with four children.  She is a very hard working entrepreneur.  Analie is 45 years old and has one child who is in school.

Analie has a fish vending business in the Philippines.  Analie requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

She has been in this business for 26 years.  Analie would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Saulo

texts.en: Saulo is 64 years old and lives in Hioma, Uganda.  He has been farming for 30 years.  He started farming on his parents land and later bought his own land that he now uses for farming.  His family goal is to educate his children and build a permanent house.  His business goal is to move his business to a more permanent location and hire employees to expand his business.  Saulo needs the loan to buy rice and maize for planting.

loans.use: to buy rice and maize to plant on his farm.

loans.name: Marta Guadalupe

texts.es: Marta Guadalupe de treinta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Ella posee una venta en una de las terminales del país, de productos de uso personal, desodorantes,  perfumes, cosméticos entre otros, se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente, pues todo los productos que comercia son de primera calidad y a precios realmente accesibles, además el servicio es único; Marta es una mujer emprendedora con mucho entusiasmo de salir adelante, piensa que el éxito no es la clave de la felicidad, sino la felicidad es la clave del éxito,  es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar perfumes, desodorantes, cosméticos, cremas etc. Marta Guadalupe tiene la confianza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marta Guadalupe is 37 years old, and lives with her life partner and children. She has a sales business at one of the main transportation terminals in the country, and she sells products for personal use, such as deodorants, perfumes, cosmetics and other items. Lately, she has acquired many customers, since she sells high quality products at very reasonable prices, and offers excellent service. 

Marta is a very entrepreneurial woman with much enthusiasm for getting ahead. She believes that success is not the key to happiness, but rather that happiness is the key to success. With her goals in mind, she has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL, which will allow her to purchase perfumes, deodorants, cosmetics, creams, etc. Marta Guadalupe is confident that this will help her to give her family a higher quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, deodorant, cosmetics and creams.

loans.name: Teodora Del Transito

texts.es: Teodora del tránsito de sesenta y dos años de edad vive con su compañero de vida, ella posee una tienda en su residencia donde vende productos de primera necesidad arroz, frijoles, leche, bebidas entre otros, se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente pues es muy conocida en la zona ya que los productos que comercia es de muy buena calidad y los vende a precios accesibles, además el servicio es excelente; Teodora es una mujer emprendedora con mucho entusiasmo de salir adelante, está dispuesta a cumplir todos sus objetivos, su más grande secreto para alcanzar el éxito es la motivación, es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, bebidas, pan, golosinas etc. Teodora tiene la confianza que así podrá darle a su familia un futuro mejor.
texts.en:
Teodora del Tránsito, 62, lives with her common law husband. She owns a shop in her house, where she sells staple products such as rice, beans, milk and beverages, among others. As of lately, she has gained an extensive clientele and a good reputation in her community because her products are of great quality and she sells them at affordable prices. Moreover, she offers excellent service. 
Teodora is an entrepreneurial woman, very enthusiastic about moving forward in life. She is determined to achieve all her objectives. Her biggest secret for success is motivation. This is why she decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL in order to be able to purchase basic staples, instant foods, beverages, bread, snacks, etc. Teodora is confident in that this will allow her to offer a better future to her family.

loans.use: Basic grains, instant products, beverages, bread, snacks

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en: Jessica works hard to support her family.  She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.  Jessica requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.  She has been in this business for nine years.  Jessica would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 52-year-old married man from Al Russeifeh, Jordan and  a father of two children. He has a grocery store and he is requesting a loan of 2000 JD to purchase goods for his store.

Mohammad is looking to improve his store and increase his income so that he can provide his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase goods for his store

loans.name: Mariéma

texts.fr: Mariéma est une une jeune femme mariée et mère de 3 enfants. Elle a ouvert depuis 7 ans , avec l'aide de son mari un atelier de couture avec une machine au départ. Actuellement, elle en compte 4 et a même aménagé un espace mercerie dans l'atelier.Ces activités lui assurent des revenus assez consistants qui lui permettent de participer à l'entretien de la famille et de prendre en charge ses propres besoins.Afin d'ouvrir une mercerie à côté de son atelier, elle sollicite un pret de 350000f pour acheter des divers produits de mercerie.
texts.en:
Mariéma is a married young woman and the mother of three children. With the help  of her husband, she opened a tailoring shop seven years ago with one machine to start with. She currently has four machines and has even fixed up part of the workshop for sewing supplies. These businesses bring in revenues substantial enough to enable her to help take care of the family and to support herself. 

In order to open a sewing supplies shop next to her workshop, Mariéma is requesting a loan of 350,000 francs to buy various sewing supplies.

loans.use: to buy various sewing supplies

loans.name: Zenat

texts.en:
Zenat is a 42-year-old married woman from Al Zaqa, Amman, Jordan and a mother of four children.

Zenat is looking to improve her family's living conditions thus she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to do maintenance for her home. An aspiration of Zenat's is to use the land her house is on to expand it.

loans.use: to do maintenance for her home

loans.name: Taghreed

texts.en:
Taghreed is a conservative person so she is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet, The man in the photo is her husband.

Taghreed is a 54-year-old married woman from Bani Kenanah, Irbid, Jordan and a mother of two children.

Taghreed has a shop selling cosmetics and accessories and she is requesting a loan of 800 JD to purchase more quantities for business purposes.

Taghreed is looking to open another branch of her shop and purchase a home for the family instead of their current rented one.

loans.use: to purchase accessories and cosmetics products for business purposes

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
La señora es socia del Banco Comunal “Corazones Unidos”, del distrito de Desaguadero, provincia Chucuito y departamento de Puno, tiene 30 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene tres hijos en estudios.
Ella estudió educación secundaria (incompleto).
La señora es una socia nueva que recientemente se incorpora a trabaja con Movimiento Manuela Ramos, su préstamo solicitado es por la suma de S/. 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero  que invertirá en su negocio de venta de salchimote (comidas rápidas), comprará tres sacos de maíz, pollo, papas, etc.  En el negocio le ayuda su esposo.
Su sueño para el futuro es tener su casa propia y mejorar el negocio.
Lo que más le gusta de su Banco Comunal son las reuniones y el compartir con las demás socias.
texts.en:
This woman is a member of the Communal Bank "Corazones Unidos" (United Hearts) which is in the District of Desaguadero in Chucuito Province, Department of Puno. She is 30 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has three children who are in school. She studied through high school, but did not finish.

This woman is a new member who recently joined Manuela Ramos. The loan she is requesting is in the amount of 500 PEN and will be invested in her business of selling "salchimote" (a type of fast food). She will buy three sacks of corn, chicken, potatoes, and other supplies. In her business, she has the help of her husband.

Her dream for the future is to have a house of her own and to improve her business. What she likes most about her Communal Bank are the meetings and the ability to share with the other members.

loans.use: to buy three sacks of corn, chicken, potatoes, and other supplies.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor tiene 39 años de edad, es casado y tiene 04  hijos como carga familiar. Vive en casa propia, la cual está ubicada en  el  Caserío Juan Velasco Alvarado del Distrito de Tambogrande.  Vive en la parte rural  de este distrito. Y solo cuenta con servicio básico de energía eléctrica.

Víctor se dedica a la agricultura, contando a la fecha con 1,50 has de terreno sembrado de limón y mango; además de productos de pan llevar.  Su esposa cuenta con una bodega donde atiende todos los días y ambos se apoyan mutuamente.  Los ingresos que perciben de las actividades a las que se dedican, los invierten en sus gastos personales y en los gastos familiares. 

Víctor desea comprar fertilizantes y realizar labores de poda y deshierbo en sus terrenos, asimismo invertirá en compra de agua para riego del cultivo, así se lograra una mejor cosecha de sus productos y venderlos a un mejor precio.  Para lograr su objetivo, Víctor ha creído conveniente obtener un préstamo de 1800 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Victor is 39 years old and married, with 4 children as his family responsibility. He lives in his own house which is located in Juan Velasco Alvarado community in the rural part of Tambogrande district. The only service he can count on is basic electrical energy.

Victor is a farmer with just 1.5 hectares of land (so far), planted with lemon and mango trees. In addition, he delivers bread products. His wife has a general store which she attends to every day, and they help each other. The income they receive from their activities is invested in paying their personal and family expenses.

Victor wishes to buy fertilizers and to hire laborers to prepare and weed their land, and to invest in purchasing irrigation water for the crops. Thus they will achieve a better harvest of their products and sell them at a better price. To achieve his objective, Victor considers it convenient to obtain a loan of 1,800 new sols through Edpyme Alternative.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Erisa

texts.en: Erisa is a 31-year-old married man living in Hioma, Uganda.  He owns a business, buying and selling produce.  The main challenges he faces are price fluctuations and theft.  His personal goals are to educate his children and to build a more permanent house for his family.  In addition, he dreams to diversify his business and to buy land for growing crops.  Erisa intends to use the loan to buy maize and rice.

loans.use: to buy maize and rice to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay for more fruit and vegetables to produce juice and "gado-gado" ( Indonesian vegetables with peanut sauce) to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to pay for more supplies to sell in her store

loans.name: Asemah

texts.en:
Asemah is a 49-year-old married woman from Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan and a mother of four children.

Asemah sells clothes and blankets and she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase more quantities for business purposes with an aspiration of improving her business.

loans.use: to purchase clothes and blankets for business purposes

loans.name: Bruno Rene

texts.es: El Joven Bruno tiene 25 años y es Soltero no tiene  hijos, el se dedica a la venta de Ropa de la una línea de ropa muy prestigiosa a nivel mundial,  el vende de manera ambulante, visitando oficinas y distintas instituciones ofreciendo sus productos. Este es su primer préstamo dentro de la institución, Bruno utilizara este préstamo para la compra de mercadería para su negocio.  Ropa por mayor, el motivo para solicitar este préstamo es el señor necesita  para reintegrar el saldo del pedido de ropa que realizo. Bruno enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia, problemas económicos, sociales y utilizara los beneficios incrementando la oferta de sus productos, su deseo para su negocio es importar ropa de calidad y ubicarse en una tienda por el centro de la ciudad, el es un joven emprendedor con ganas de superación se siente feliz y agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Bruno is 25 years old, single without children, and makes a living selling name brand clothing from a line that is well-known around the world. He travels around selling his products, and visits various offices and establishments. This is his first loan with this institution, and Bruno will use the loan to purchase clothing in bulk for his business. He is requesting the loan because he wants to pay the balance on the order of clothes he has purchased for resale.

Bruno encounters challenges in his business, among them competition, and financial and social problems, and he will use the benefits of the loan to expand his offering of products. His goal for his business is to import high quality clothing and establish a physical location for his business in the city center. He is an entrepreneurial young man with a desire to achieve and be happy. He is grateful to this institution for their support.

loans.use: to purchase clothing in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase groceries such as rice, sugar, and pasta.

loans.name: Ericka Roxana

texts.es:
Ericka Roxana tiene 29 años de edad, es casada y tiene 1 hijo de 6 años de edad, vive una colonia de San Juan Pueblo, Atlántida.
Ericka es una muchacha muy emprendedora logro establecer hace año y medio su propio negocio de venta de comida como ser pollo con tajadas, baleadas, desayunos, almuerzos, etc.  El cual lo tiene establecido en el centro de la ciudad. Manifiesta que le va muy bien en el negocio porque tiene buena  ubicación, existen muchos negocios comerciales, por lo tanto la demanda de clientes es muy buena. Trabaja desde las 7.00 am hasta las 8.00 pm.
En la actualidad solicito un préstamo de 10,000 lempiras para comprar insumos para la elaboración de sus comidas. Con esta inversión mejorara  el servicio a los clientes.
Su meta es  seguir trabajando y hacer crecer su negocio logrando aumentar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Ericka Roxana is 29 years old, married, and has a six-year-old child. She lives in the subdivision of San Juan Pueblo, Atlántida. Ericka is an enterprising woman who established her own business a year and a half ago. She sells food such as chicken with fried plantains, "baleadas" (tortillas stuffed with beans, cheese, and other ingredients), as well as breakfasts, lunches, and other dishes. Her establishment is in the central part of the city. Ericka says that she has done very well because she has a good location where there are many retail businesses. As a result, the demand from her customers has been very good. She works from 7am to 8pm.

Ericka is currently requesting a loan of 10,000 HNL so that she can buy supplies for making her dishes. With this investment, she will improve the service to her customers. Her goals are to continue working, grow her business, and increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making her dishes.

loans.name: Felly Mae

texts.en:
Felly Mae is 25 years old.  She is married and has four children, two of whom are in school.

Felly Mae is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines.  Felly Mae has requested a loan of 17,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy feed and more livestock.  She has been raising livestock for eight years now and has borrowed from NWTF 10 times in the past in order to sustain her business.

Felly Mae would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and livestock.

loans.name: Wahab Rajawali Group

texts.en:
Nani is pictured in the middle, wearing a striped T-shirt. She is married with four children. Two of them already got married and two of them are still going to school. She has been selling "wet snacks" which should be sold out on the same day for five years. She sells them from her house. Her business is going well and people like her snacks, so  now she plans to use her part of the loan to buy more ingredients such as sugar, flour and eggs to increase her production volume and generate more income. 

In the future she hopes she can have a nice kiosk in front of her house. Also she hopes two of her children who are still at school can reach university, not just get married like their siblings.

Other group members are selling soft drinks and ice pops, selling "cireng" (Indonesian snacks) and selling clothes on credit.

loans.use: to pay for more ingredients such as sugar, flour, and eggs to produce snacks to sell

loans.name: Leonita

texts.en:
Leonita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a rice retailing business in the Philippines.  She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy more sacks of rice to sell to her customers. Leonita has been in this business for two years. She earns more income from vegetable vending.

Leonita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Elecita

texts.en:
Elecita is 35 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by farming vegetables in the Philippines.  Elecita has been farming vegetables for 10 years and also earns additional income from fattening pigs.  She is borrowing 12,000 PHP through NWTF to buy fertilizer and feed for her pigs.

Elecita is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Glenda

texts.en:
Glenda is 34 years old.  She is married and has two children who are in school.  She works very hard to provide for them.

Glenda runs a sari-sari store, or general store, in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for seven years and sells a variety of items such as bread, canned goods and other groceries.  She has requested a loan of 24,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy more items to sell in her sari-sari store.

Glenda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en:
Miriam is 45 years old and supports a family of eight. She is married to Dickson who also contributes to the family needs, and they have six children. She has been in business for four years and generates KES 10,000 per month.

This is her second loan from KADET LTD, after successfully repaying her first loan. She will use the loan to  purchase more stock of bread, maize flour, wheat flour and tea leaves for sale. The profits will be used to buy a small plot of land for the family and also to pay her children's school fees. 


She anticipates that she will  be able to run her business smoothly and also be able to provide for her family.

loans.use: To purchase more stock of bread, maize flour, wheat flour and tea leaves for sale.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 42 years old.  She is married and has three children who attend school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Gemma has a pottery business in the Philippines.   Gemma has requested a loan in the amount of 18,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy materials needed for her pottery business.  Gemma has been in this business for five years. 

In the future, Gemma would like to save enough to provide financial stability for her family.

loans.use: to buy materials needed for her pottery business.

loans.name: Pasikale

texts.en: Pasikale is a hardworking married father of four children living in Hoima, Uganda. He has been selling alcohol and with the proceeds, he has been able to educate his children who are now all in school. He faces business challenges of price fluctuations and theft. His family goal is to educate his children and build a permanent house. His business goal is to expand to new markets and diversify into selling other products. Pasikale needs the loan facility to buy local brew to sell.

loans.use: to buy local brew to sell.

loans.name: Lea

texts.en:
Lea works hard to support her family. Lea is married and has a business selling vegetables in the Philippines.

Lea requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more spices and vegetables to sell in her stall.

Lea has been in this business for 17 years.

In the future, Lea would like to save enough money to send her children to school.
